post.description: Create a new community with the provided data. JWT required.

put.description: Update an existing community by community_id.

delete.description: Disable a community by community_id (soft delete).

put.description: Add a user to a community using community_id and user_id.
Remove a user from a community using community_id and user_id.

post.description: Request to join a community using community_id and user_id.
Confirm or reject a user's request to join a community using request_id.

get.description: Get all join requests for a community using community_id.
